snippet.title: Fathers' Day Tech Gift Guide
snippet.description: Forget the neckties and wristwatches, and get the fathers in your life the tech they really want. Yo

snippet.title: Best laptops
snippet.description: CNET editors choose and review the best thin and light laptops, notebooks, and ultrabooks.

snippet.title: Brian Cox's Wonders of Life
snippet.description: Brian Cox's Wonders of Life is worth the money, but you'll need to follow the app's intended narrative to fully enjoy the experience.

snippet.title: Blu Life View
snippet.description: The $299 Blu Life View serves up a huge 5.7-inch display, runs on Android 4.2 Jelly Bean, is unlocked, and bears dual SIM card slots.

snippet.title: TDK Life on Record A33 Wireless Weatherproof Speaker
snippet.description: While the TDK Life on Record A33 Wireless Weatherproof Speaker has a few small shortcomings, it delivers very good sound for its size and price and is well suited to both indoor and outdoor use with a sturdy, splashproof design.

snippet.title: Blu Products Life Play
snippet.description: The unlocked $229 Blu Life Play offers Android Jelly Bean on the cheap, but getting the more expensive $299 LG Nexus 4 would be a wiser decision.

snippet.title: Cyclops Gear CG Life 2 video glasses
snippet.description: Lean on features with merely OK video and a design that isn't for everyone, the best part about the Cyclops Gear CGLife 2 HD video glasses is their simplicity.

snippet.title: Apple MacBook Air (13-inch, June 2013)
snippet.description: Apple keeps the latest MacBook Air updates on the inside, but greatly improved battery life and a lower starting price make up for a lack of flashy design changes.

snippet.title: TiltShift Video (iOS)
snippet.description: TiltShift Video is a great option for giving your photos and videos that miniaturized effect, but adds more work than necessary without key features.

snippet.title: Tablets with the best battery life
snippet.description: Let's take a moment to celebrate the current top six longest-lasting tablets.
